plot: A no-holds-barred account of the interrogation and torture suffered by five British Muslims, four of them captured in a battle with coalition forces in Afghanistan, while the fifth was caught trying to blow up a plane bound for the United States. Based on real-life events following 9/11 that still make the international news agenda, this could possibly be the most controversial film to come out of the United Kingdom.
title: Camp X-Ray: Ghosts of Guantánamo Bay
